name: UI/UX Design
description: Creating modern interfaces and optimal user experiences

user-centered-design.title: User-centered UI/UX design
user-centered-design.description: An approach that places user needs at the heart of our designs, validated by interactive prototypes.

creative-innovation.title: Creative innovation
creative-innovation.description: Creative UI/UX solutions and innovative prototypes that set your brand apart while respecting standards.

iterative-prototyping.title: Iterative prototyping
iterative-prototyping.description: A methodology based on rapid prototypes and frequent iterations to refine the user experience.

business-objectives.title: Business objectives
business-objectives.description: UI/UX design aligned with your business goals, validated by user testing on prototypes.

needs-analysis.title: Needs analysis
needs-analysis.description: Crucial first step where we analyze your needs, brand and business objectives to define the UI/UX direction.

research-moodboard.title: Research and moodboard
research-moodboard.description: Creating moodboards and exploring possible creative directions. Defining the overall artistic direction.

wireframes.title: Wireframes
wireframes.description: Designing wireframes to validate structure, hierarchy and information architecture.

interface-design.title: Interface design
interface-design.description: Creating final mockups while respecting your brand guidelines. Special attention to components and their reusability.

prototyping.title: Prototyping
prototyping.description: Creating prototypes to test interactions and validate user journeys.

development.title: Development
development.description: Transforming mockups into functional interfaces, with particular attention to defined animations.
